## canvasWebGL2 variable

Same as `canvasWebGL` but targets WebGL2.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canvasWebGL2: (handlers: Partial<CanvasHandlers<WebGL2RenderingContext>>, opts?: WebGLContextAttributes | undefined) => {
    init(_el: HTMLCanvasElement, hctx: any, ...args: any[]): void;
    render(hctx: any, ...args: any[]): any[];
    release(hctx: any, ...args: any[]): void;
}
```
